citations.narrative:
There were seven enclosures containing one or two hedgehogs each. The facility representative reported that the
enclosures had not been cleaned for over a week and the exercise wheels had not been cleaned since possibly October.
There was a large accumulation of feces in the litter boxes, moderate accumulation in all other areas of the enclosures,
and caked feces all the way around the wheels. There was nowhere for the hedgehogs to completely escape coming into
contact with the feces.
Contamination with excreta increases the chances of illness or disease and the possibility of pests infestation.
Excreta shall be removed from primary enclosures as often as necessary to prevent contamination of the animals
contained therein and to minimize disease hazards and to reduce odors.
To be corrected by: February 12th, 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.131(a) 
   
Sanitation. 
There were seven enclosures containing one or two hedgehogs each. The facility representative reported that the 
enclosures had not been cleaned for over a week and the exercise wheels had not been cleaned since possibly October. 
There was a large accumulation of feces in the litter boxes, moderate accumulation in all other areas of the enclosures, 
and caked feces all the way around the wheels. There was nowhere for the hedgehogs to completely escape coming into 
contact with the feces.  
Contamination with excreta increases the chances of illness or disease and the possibility of pests infestation.  
Excreta shall be removed from primary enclosures as often as necessary to prevent contamination of the animals 
contained therein and to minimize disease hazards and to reduce odors. 
To be corrected by: February 12th, 2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
